entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
